subtitleNullable: Multiple cities solar radiation measurements dataset in different stations.
descriptionNullable:
Multiple cities dataset in Pakistan including:
- Karachi
- Lahore
- Islamabad
- Peshawar

There is also a combined CSV which includes combined data of these cities, consisting of:
 - 479618 rows
 - 16 columns


Features metadata description:

- 'time' = Date time
- 'ghi_pyr' = GHI Pyranometer
- 'dni' = Direct normal irradiance (DNI)
- 'dhi' = Diffuse horizontal irradiance (DHI)
- 'air_temperature' = Temperature
- 'relative_humidity', = Humidity
- 'wind_speed' = Wind speed
- 'wind_speed_of_gust' = Speed of gust
- 'wind_from_direction_st_dev', = Wind direction standard deviation
- 'wind_from_direction' = Direction
- 'barometric_pressure' = Pressure
- 'sensor_cleaning' = Sensor cleaning
- 'comments' = Station comments
- 'actual_date' = Datetime
- 'day_lenght' = Day lenght (sunset - sunrise)
- 'ghi_rsi' = GHI Rotating Shadowband Irradiometer (RSI)

## Please do UPVOTE to show your support  🙌
